Articles.Content:
So I have a good idea. A lot of people have been having errors with Mono.dll and searching through thousands of files and manually logging them all is boring and takes a LOOOONG time... So my idea is ill use a program that looks through all of KSPs files and tells you which ones to delete! That should liberate Mono.dll but there a few things I don't know how to code yet and I would appreciate if someone would code and send them to me. Here they are:

 

-Program that logs files

-Program that can launch executables (optional)

-Program that can delete files (optional (Read spoiler below))

Spoiler

Used to automatically delete files that need deleting.

Can anyone send me these programs?

I guess it dose sound stupid... I think I should just throw away the idea. What do you think?

Edited August 12, 2017 by Firefox101

8 hours ago, Firefox101 said:

So I have a good idea. A lot of people have been having errors with Mono.dll

Do you know what causes a Mono.dll crash? The answer is outdated mods. And the fix is really easy: Go through your mods and make sure that you're only using mods marked as compatible for the version of KSP that you're playing. There's even a program built to help reveal which mods are out of date:
